user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the operation to create, split, and convert hourly hydrogen demand profiles based on the provided TYNDP 2026 scenario specifications.

tasks.description: Decompose annual hydrogen demand into hourly profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenario using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios and the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now', select the most appropriate object from the available list.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as required by the scenario using the splitting pipeline.

Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now', select the most appropriate object from the available list.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP 2026 study.
